duties_responsibilities.duty: Represent CalOptima Health in the community and to community-based organizations.
Plan and coordinate community outreach activities, including networking forums, town hall meetings, educational seminars, and health fairs.
Serve as a subject matter expert for CalOptima Health’s programs and services and the Community Relations department’s processes and procedures.
Assist with program development, implementation, and monitoring of new and existing projects for the Community Relations department.
Support management with special projects, CalOptima Health-led meetings and events, and other assigned projects.
Support all levels of leadership and key stakeholders within the organization and in the community.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Public Health, Public Relations, Health and Human Services or related field (Master’s degree preferred)
